name: Midnight at Forest
description:
Midnight at Forest


Midnight at Forest is a single-player horror game created by 2 indie developers, you need to collect 5 keys in order to unlock the gate and survive. There is a large map, creepy vibes, and a few other things that you need to find out.

Features
  • Creepy sounds
  • Large forest
  • Much more

Planned Features
  • Multiplayer
  • 5 game modes
  • Rewards for finishing
